DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Expressive Writing Intervention About Communicatively-Restricted Organizational Stressors
DOC.criteria: 110 pound weight Ability fast 8 hour prior laboratory visit Staff member Santa Clara University Certain level inclusionary pretest stress measure Hepatitis Endocrine Disease Kidney Liver Disease Cancer ( form ) Cushing 's disorder Rheumatological disorder Respiratory Disorders Diabetes High blood pressure Low blood pressure Heart cardiovascular problem Chemotherapy Current use alpha beta blocker , steroid , hormone replacement Pregnant and/or breastfeed mother
